summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 31, Mount Baker Park Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue South and 37th Place, from Hanford Street to Mount Rainier Drive, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 92726 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
